| icon           = poe2 mother_of_pearl icon.png
| description    = Mother of pearl can be scraped from the outer layer of pearls, though it is most commonly harvested from the shells of some clams and sea snails. It is prized for its subtle iridescence and is often used to create jewelry or as an inlay for wooden furniture and instruments.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Gem
| item_category  = Ingredient
| requirements   =

| is_unique      = no
| value          = 60
| shop_value     = 300
| range          =

| internalname   = Gem_Mother_of_pearl
| location       =  * [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/): Sold by [Una](/una/) in the daytime.
* [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [Delver's Row](/delversRow/): Sold by [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/).
* [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/), [The Treasure Trove](/theTreasureTrove/): occasionally sold by [Dimesa](/dimesa/).
* [Crookspur](/crookspur/): In a hidden rubble pile on the beach to the east.
* Dropped by the [Kraken](/krakenDeadfire/) fought in [Cignath Mór](/cignathMor/) when defying Galawain during [Overgrowth](/overgrowth/) (x5).
| guid           =ec090111-cbc3-4da3-8b70-d0c20ae9fb2c
}}
